meanings.definition: The largest muscle in the calf of the leg, arising from the back of the femur and joining the Achilles tendon.
meanings.sent1: After running, you may feel a tightness in your gastrocnemius.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often strengthen their gastrocnemius muscles for better performance.
meanings.sent3: The gastrocnemius muscle decided to take a break during the marathon.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the gastrocnemius muscle in her leg.
meanings.sent5: The gastrocnemius muscle is crucial for walking and running smoothly.
